remarks: Less-than or equal property of lattice translation converse. (Contributed by NM, 10-May-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ltrnle.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
ltrnle.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
ltrnle.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
ltrnle.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
ltrncnvleN $p |- ( ( ( K e. V /\ W e. H ) /\ F e. T /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) ) -> ( X .<_ Y <-> ( `' F ` X ) .<_ ( `' F ` Y ) ) ) $.
